"Rainbow Surprise" - A candy that changes color and flavor as you eat it. Each bite brings a new taste sensation and visual experience. It's like a party in your mouth!
"Chillberry Swirl" - A candy that combines the cool and refreshing taste of blueberries with the sweetness of honey. The swirling texture adds an extra layer of fun.
"Mocha Mudslide" - A chocolate-covered candy with a coffee-infused center. The smooth, creamy texture and rich flavor make it a perfect treat for coffee lovers.
"Bubblegum Blast" - A candy that explodes in your mouth with a burst of bubblegum flavor. The chewy texture and bright pink color make it a fun and playful treat.
"Fruity Fizz" - A candy that combines the tangy taste of citrus fruits with a carbonated fizz. It's like a sparkling fruit punch in a candy form!
